duties_responsibilities.duty: Instruct, docket, and manage trademark filings worldwide.
Conduct trademark database searches and prepare clearance report for attorney review.
Correspond with foreign trademark agents and maintain files.
Prepare trademark prosecution and maintenance filings for attorney review.
Assist with conflict matters, including managing evidence and documents for trademark oppositions and cancellations.
Review product documentation for trademark use and intellectual property notices.
Assist in trademark process improvements and development of process documentation.
